text: Soni Ayuda akasatiji: “Akilisito nganaŵa pa chilichose (ŵangali dini jaakukuya).” Nombe Akilisito akasatiji: “Ayuda nganaŵa pa chilichose (ŵangali dini jaakukuya).” Kutendaga ŵanganyao akusoomaga Chitabu, mmomopemo mwa kulandana nimaloŵe ga ŵanganyao nimwaakuŵechetela ŵandu ŵangali chachimanyi (ŵagalagatila isanamu). Sano Allah ni jwatachijilanya chilikati chao lisiku lya Kiyama pa ichindu yaŵaliji nkutindana pa yalakweyo
